description: A tag-based file format for storing and interchanging raster images. TIFF serves as a wrapper for different bitstream encodings for bit-mapped (raster) images. The different encodings may represent different compression schemes and different schemes for color representation (photometric interpretation).

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
